scUnify 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

integrate_v4

integrate_v4.Rd

Wrapper function to integrate cells by samples

Usage

integrate_v4(
  x,
  split.by,
  assay = "RNA",
  nfeatures = 3000,
  method = "rpca",
  k.weight = 100
)

Arguments

x

Seurat object

split.by

variable to split object by

assay

assay name of gene expression. Defaults to "RNA"

nfeatures

no. of features to select for integration

method

integration method, see Seurat::indIntegrationAnchors()

k.weight

k.weight, see Seurat::IntegrateData(), reduce when no. of cells in samples are low.
